property.name: id
property.shortdesc: The unique ID of the TrapPreset.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the TrapPreset (a Application or Document).

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the TrapPreset within its containing object.

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The name of the TrapPreset.

property.name: defaultTrapWidth
property.shortdesc: The default width for trapping all colors except those involving solid black. (Range depends on unit. For points: 0.0 to 8.0; picas: 0p0 to 0p8; inches: 0 to 0.1111; mm: 0 to 2.822; cm: 0 to .2822; ciceros: 0c0 to 0c7.507)

property.name: blackWidth
property.shortdesc: The black width. (Range depends on unit. For points: 0.0 to 8.0; picas: 0p0 to 0p8; inches: 0 to 0.1111; mm: 0 to 2.822; cm: 0 to .2822; ciceros: 0c0 to 0c7.507)

property.name: trapJoin
property.shortdesc: The join type of the trap preset.

property.name: trapEnd
property.shortdesc: The shape to use at the intersection of three-way traps.

property.name: objectsToImages
property.shortdesc: If true, ensures that vector objects overlap bitmap images.

property.name: imagesToImages
property.shortdesc: If true, turns on trapping along the boundary of overlapping or abutting bitmap images.

property.name: internalImages
property.shortdesc: If true, turns on trapping among colors within individual bitmap images.

property.name: oneBitImages
property.shortdesc: If true, ensures that one-bit images trap to abutting objects.

property.name: imagePlacement
property.shortdesc: The trap placement between vector objects and bitmap images.

property.name: stepThreshold
property.shortdesc: The amount (as a percentage) that components of abutting colors must vary before a trap is created. (Range: 1 to 100)

property.name: blackColorThreshold
property.shortdesc: The minimum amount (as a percentage) of black ink required before the black width setting is applied. (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: blackDensity
property.shortdesc: The neutral density value at or above which an ink is considered black. (Range: .001 to 10)

property.name: slidingTrapThreshold
property.shortdesc: The difference (as a percentage) between the neutral densities of abutting colors at which the trap is moved from the darker side of a color edge toward the centerline. (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: colorReduction
property.shortdesc: The degree (as a percentage) to which components from abutting colors are used to reduce the trap color. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: 0% makes a trap whose neutral density is equal to the neutral density of the darker color.

property.name: label
property.shortdesc: A property that can be set to any string.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

parameters.name: replacingWith
parameters.shortdesc: The trap preset to apply in place of the deleted preset.

method.name: insertLabel
method.shortdesc: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.

method.name: extractLabel
method.shortdesc: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TrapPreset.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
